CustomField.description: EPH-7724 Add new fields to Coupon Object
CustomField.formula: "Debit for " & Coupon_ID__c & " Seller Funded Coupon " & TEXT(MONTH( Coupon_Start_Date__c )) &"/"& TEXT(DAY(Coupon_Start_Date__c )) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR( Coupon_Start_Date__c )) & " - " & TEXT(MONTH( Coupon_End_Date__c )) &"/"& TEXT(DAY(Coupon_End_Date__c )) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR( Coupon_End_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: Memo
